Variable.name: X
Description: place holder created by R. Unreliable.

Variable.name: plot
Description: Plot number

Variable.name: tree
Description: Tree number. Unique within a plot.

Variable.name: stem
Description: Stem number. Unique within a tree.

Variable.name: live
Description: If a stem is alive (1) or not (0)

Variable.name: bark
Description: If a stem has bark (1) or not (0)

Variable.name: bkDpth1
Description: Depth of bark

Variable.name: bkDpth2
Description: Second measurement of bark depth

Variable.name: dbh
Description: Diameter at breast height of a given stem

Variable.name: spp
Description: Subspecies of Eucalyptus pauciflora

Variable.name: burnt
Description: If there are any signs of burning on this stem (1) or not (0)

Variable.name: regrowth
Description: If there are signs of regrowth on the stem (1) or not (0)

Variable.name: pres
Description: If a stem has hollows (1) or not (0)

Variable.name: number
Description: Number of hollows on the stem

Variable.name: heightM
Description: Height of the tree

Variable.name: flag
Description: Data quality flag

Variable.name: canopy
Description: Canopy quality where n = none (no leaves); p = poor (>75% of branchlets with dead/missing leaves); f = fair (50-75% likewise); g = good (25-50% likewise); e = excellent (<25% likewise)

Variable.name: galleries
Description: If galleries are present on the stem (1) or not (0)

Variable.name: frass
Description: If frass is present on the stem (1) or not (0)

Variable.name: puckering
Description: If puckering is present on the stem (1) or not (0)

Variable.name: canopy.number
Description: `canopy` converted to a number where 1 = none and 5 = excellent

Variable.name: beetlesum
Description: If beetle evidence (galleries, frass, puckering) is present on a stem (1) or not (0)

Variable.name: stemID
Description: Unique ID of the stem made of the plot number, the tree number, and the stem number separated by periods

Variable.name: basal.area
Description: Basal area of the stem calculated from DBH

Variable.name: plotNickname
Description: Nickname of the plot, if applicable

Variable.name: burnHistory
Description: If there is evidence of burn on the stem (only works for 2024 trees)

Variable.name: health
Description: canopy health of the stem (only works for 2024 trees)

Variable.name: GPS
Description: GPS point number of the tree (only if a dendrometer was installed)

Variable.name: dendroNr
Description: Dendrometer number, if applicable

Variable.name: dendroType
Description: Dendrometer type, if applicable
